content: get ready for fall with this warm and wonderful dream colour shawl 1 in hobbii dream colour 2 dream colour consists of 100% virgin wool in large fabulous skeins of 3 5 oz each with a long yardage the yarn has long beautiful color transitions and is available in a unique color scale dream coluor is able to transform even the most simple models into beautiful unique creations such as this shawl crocheted in granny stripes with a pretty edge choose your favorite dream colour color and design your own shawl - **materials ** - crochet hook no g/6 4 mm hobbii dream colour yarn **measurements ** approx 59 84 x 25 19 inches 152x64 cm if you like the shawl to be bigger you can just continue the pattern till you reach the desired length **usage ** approx 8 11 oz 3 skeins of yarn **abbreviations ** **s** stitch **chain** chain **double_crochet** double_crochet gr group 1 https //hobbii com/dream-colour-shawl utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=dream-colour-shawl&utm_term=swr 2 https //hobbii com/dream-colour-1002196 utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=product&utm_content=dreamcolour&utm_term=swr
